text: Paul Gludovatz (10 June 1946 â€“ 12 November 2021) was an Austrian football manager. He managed Austrian national youth football teams from 1981 to 2008. He retired in 2016. Gludovatz died on 12 November 2021 in Vienna, Austria from problems caused by COVID-19, aged 75. ==References== Category:1946 births Category:2021 deaths Category:Deaths from the COVID-19 pandemic in Austria Category:Austrian football managers Category:SV Ried managers
